mapper.select: SELECT T.TRADE_NO, T.TRADE_STATUS_NO, T.FINAL_BID_PRICE, SELLER.NICKNAME AS SELLER_NICKNAME, SELLER,AMOUNT AS SELLER_AMOUNT, BIDDER.NICKNAME AS BIDDER_NICKNAME, BIDDER.AMOUNT AS BIDDER_AMOINT FROM TRADE T JOIN MEMBER SELLER ON SELLER.NICKNAME = T.SELLER JOIN MEMVER BIDDER ON BIDDER.NICKNAME = T.BIDDER_NICKNAME WHERE T.TRADE_NO = #{trade_no}
